member.name: PSHNOTIFY
member.summary: Contains information for the property sheet notification messages.

member.name: PSHNOTIFY.hdr
member.summary: Address of an structure that contains additional information about the notification.

member.name: PSHNOTIFY.lParam
member.summary: Additional information about this notification. To determine what, if any, information is contained in this member, see the description of the particular notification message.
